name: Find The Neon Whale
description:
This was just a little project I did on my Unity/C# education in Novska by PISMO.

It's a space FPS with nice little atmosphere. Movement is fast and satisfying.

Has giant space monsters in the background, grim dark colors and also some nice tunnels and weird platforms. There is a weird easter egg somewhere (in the second fast rotating earth?????)

Be gentle, I'm new at this :*

Enjoy!!
